pr_title: Fix the bug that clientPool#close will block forever when newClient encountered an exception.

timeline.message: Fix the bug that clientPool#close will block forever when newClient encountered an exception.

timeline.bodyText: This is real issue here right? We have the possibility of incrementing current size even if "newClient" failed in the old code? If so this seems like the right fix to me
timeline.author: RussellSpitzer

timeline.bodyText: Can we call this something other than MockClientPool? It injects a failure, so I think a name like FailNewClientPool would be better.
timeline.author: rdblue
